categories: Category:Imperial Navy officers of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: Gunham was a Commander and Imperial Pilot Coordinator of the Imperial Navy.

During 1 ABY, Gunham was stationed at the Bestine capitol on Tatooine. His main job was to oversee the recruitment of pilots under Admiral Veckon's aggressive push for new pilots. Periodically, he would also process papers for pilots who wished to resign, but not without chiding them first.
Commander Gunham is a Non-Player Character in the MMORPG Star Wars Galaxies. In the game, players can talk to him to resign from the Imperial Starfleet.
